newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - GBC Bancorp rating cut.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - GBC Bancorp rating cut.

text.p: Jefferies & Co Inc Monday said analyst Charlotte Chamberlain cut her rating on shares of GBC Bancorp based on the stock price and lower earnings estimates due to the planned issuance of $25 million in debt.
-- In a statement, she cut 1997 earnings estimate to $3.26/shr from $3.35 and 1998 to $3.63/shr from $3.70.
-- She said GBC lacks a compelling use of proceeds making the cost of the debt "not the best management of capital."
-- added, however, the company is undervalued versus Calif. competitors and is a good investment for interests in Taiwan.
-- GBC shares were up 1-1/2 at 42 by midday.
